text: أَنَّىٰ لَهُمُ ٱلذِّكۡرَىٰ وَقَدۡ جَآءَهُمۡ رَسُولٞ مُّبِينٞ

translation.en: How will there be for them a reminder [at that time]? And there had come to them a clear Messenger
translation.id: Bagaimana mereka dapat menerima peringatan, padahal (sebelumnya pun) seorang Rasul telah datang memberi penjelasan kepada mereka
